content: 20-23 repeat row 4-7 edging slip_stitch in each half_double_crochet and double_crochet across ch1 turn slip_stitch in half_double_crochet and double_crochet across again you will still be able to see the tops of the half_double_crochet s and double_crochet s you will slip_stitch in those again fasten_off leaving about 12 inches of yarn to sew wrist warmer together with matching ends of row up carefully sew both ends of work up edging on opposite end of wrist warmer after the wrist warmer has been sewed up take the 80 inches of yarn that is still connected to first row of wrist warmer and bring up a loop ch1 and single_crochet in other side of chain right hand row 1-12 repeat same as left hand row 13 half_double_crochet in next 4 half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in each of next 2 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 4 half_double_crochet bpdc around next 2 double_crochet half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet bpdc around next 4 tc half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet bpdc around next 2 double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 10 half_double_crochet ch1 turn the increases in row s 13-16 are for thumbhole 24 half_double_crochet 8 bpdc row 14 half_double_crochet in next 10 half_double_crochet fpdc around next 2 double_crochet half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet fpdc around next 4 double_crochet half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet fpdc around next 2 double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 4 half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 2 half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 4 half_double_crochet ch1 turn 26 half_double_crochet 8 fpdc row 15 half_double_crochet in next 4 half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 4 half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 4 half_double_crochet bpdc around next 2 double_crochet half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet bpdc around next 4 double_crochet half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet bpdc around next 2 double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 10 half_double_crochet ch1 turn 28 half_double_crochet 8 bpdc row 16 half_double_crochet in next 10 half_double_crochet fpdc in next 2 double_crochet half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet skip next 2 double_crochet fptc around next 2 double_crochet fptc around 1 skipped st and next skipped st half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet fpdc around next 2 double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 4 half_double_crochet st 2 half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 6 half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 4 half_double_crochet ch1 turn 30 half_double_crochet 4 fpdc 4 fptc row 17 half_double_crochet in next 5 half_double_crochet skip next 8 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 5 half_double_crochet bpdc around next 2 double_crochet half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet bpdc around next 4 tc half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet bpdc in next 2 double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 10 half_double_crochet ch1 turn thumb hole just made 22 half_double_crochet 8 bpdc row 18-19 repeat row 6 and 7 row 20-23 repeat row 4-7 edging same as for left warmer this pattern is copyrighted to julee reeves september 2nd 2008 pattern is for personal gifts and that sort of thing and charity use only if you would like to sell the finished item please contact me for permission if permission to sell the finished item
